QuestData.Title: Keymaster Urmgrgl
QuestData.Description: I have to get out of these caverns! There's magic stuff seeping in from Coldarra, above, and affecting everyone's minds.$B$BI don't intend to be controlled like these others!$B$BKeymaster Urmgrgl is in the cave below and to the south. He holds the key to my cage. Get it from him and bring it back so that I can unlock my cage and get out of here.$B$BHurry!
QuestData.LogDescription: Glrglrglr inside the Winterfin Caverns has asked you to retrieve Urmgrgl's Key.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the key?$B$BNo, I don't care about any of these others. I just want to get out of here!
